If you purchase any products online, or have any other interaction with our Websites, we will receive and store information that you provide or that is generated by your actions.
If you purchase any products online, or have any other interaction with our Websites, we will receive and store information that you provide or that is generated by your actions.

For example, cookies are placed on your computer (explained in more detail below) to remember your name and the contents of your shopping cart. This allows you to leave our site, come back later, and still have the contents of your shopping cart intact.

We may receive a confirmation when you open any email that we send to you, if your computer supports such capabilities. If you send us any email, we will retain such email and your email address for response. We also may compare our customer list to lists received from other companies, in an effort to avoid sending unnecessary or duplicate messages to you.
